meanings.definition: Sophies (noun): A plural form of the name Sophie.
meanings.sent1: The party was full of Sophies celebrating their birthdays.
meanings.sent2: The Sophies in the class were best friends.
meanings.sent3: Sophies always seem to have a great sense of humor.
meanings.sent4: The room lit up with laughter when the Sophies entered.
meanings.sent5: The Sophies' laughter echoed through the halls.

meanings.definition: Sophies (verb): Third person singular present of the verb sophy.
meanings.sent1: She sophies with grace and elegance.
meanings.sent2: He sophies every morning before starting his day.
meanings.sent3: Sophying is a daily routine for her.
meanings.sent4: The way he sophies shows his dedication.
meanings.sent5: Her ability to sophy is truly impressive.

meanings.definition: Sophies (adjective): Of or relating to Sophie.
meanings.sent1: The Sophies club organized a charity event.
meanings.sent2: Her room was decorated with Sophies memorabilia.
meanings.sent3: The cake had a Sophies theme, with pink frosting and sprinkles.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with Sophies flowers in bloom.
meanings.sent5: The painting featured a Sophies color palette.
